name: Create Test Cases
title: Create Test Cases
task: Write test cases for a new feature.
goal: Ensure comprehensive testing of new functionality.
context: After feature development and before release.
details: Include test case formats and management tools.

name: Execute Regression Testing
title: Execute Regression Testing
task: Describe your approach to regression testing before a release.
goal: Verify that existing functionality is not broken by new changes.
details: Include regression testing tools and strategies.

name: Report Bugs
title: Report Bugs
task: Document and report a bug found during testing.
goal: Ensure timely identification and resolution of defects.
details: Include bug reporting templates and tools.

name: Automate Tests
title: Automate Tests
task: Outline steps to automate repetitive test scenarios.
goal: Increase testing efficiency and coverage through automation.
details: Include automation tools and scripting standards.

name: Test Documentation
title: Test Documentation
task: Write documentation for the testing process of a new module.
goal: Provide clear guidelines and information for testers.
context: After test planning and before test execution.

name: Performance Testing
title: Performance Testing
task: Describe how you would conduct performance testing for a web application.
goal: Ensure the application meets performance requirements and is scalable.
details: Include performance testing tools and metrics.

name: Security Testing
title: Security Testing
task: List key security tests to perform on a new release.
context: Before each release, as part of regression testing.
details: Include security testing tools and techniques.

name: Usability Testing
title: Usability Testing
task: Explain your process for conducting usability testing.
goal: Ensure the product is user-friendly and meets user needs.
details: Include usability testing methods and reporting.

name: Test Environment Setup
title: Test Environment Setup
task: Describe how you set up a test environment for a new project.
goal: Ensure a stable and representative test environment.
context: At the start of a new project or testing phase.
details: Include environment configuration and management tools.

name: Defect Tracking
title: Defect Tracking
task: Explain how you track and manage defects throughout the testing cycle.
goal: Maintain visibility and control over defect resolution.
details: Include defect tracking tools and reporting metrics.

name: Test Coverage Analysis
title: Test Coverage Analysis
task: Analyze and report on test coverage for a release.
goal: Ensure comprehensive testing and identify gaps in coverage.
context: Before each release, as part of test analysis.
details: Include coverage metrics and improvement recommendations.

name: Acceptance Testing
title: Acceptance Testing
task: Describe the process for conducting acceptance testing with stakeholders.
goal: Validate that the product meets business requirements and is ready for release.
details: Include acceptance criteria and testing procedures.
